summary: LightningModule is the core abstraction for defining deep learning models in the Lightning framework. It centralizes model forward logic, training/validation/testing steps, optimizer and scheduler configuration, gradient handling, logging, checkpointing, and device/mesh management, while providing hooks for custom behavior and seamless integration with distributed training.
